title: Get parts of a timestamp (years, days, etc.)
sql:
select 
  extract ( year            from systimestamp ) yr,
  extract ( month           from systimestamp ) mth,
  extract ( day             from systimestamp ) dy,
  extract ( hour            from systimestamp ) hr,
  extract ( minute          from systimestamp ) mn,
  extract ( second          from systimestamp ) s,
  extract ( timezone_hour   from systimestamp ) tzhr,
  extract ( timezone_minute from systimestamp ) tzmn,
  extract ( timezone_region from systimestamp ) tzr,
  extract ( timezone_abbr   from systimestamp ) tza
from   dual;

    YR   MTH    DY    HR     MN         S  TZHR  TZMN TZR            TZA
----- ----- ----- ----- ------ --------- ----- ----- -------------- ----
  2022     8    29    12     00 35.063073     1     0 Europe/London  BST
